snippet: The family will spend time in August at a home in Amagansett, but will kick off their vacation with a benefit for the Bill, Hillary and Chelsea Clinton Foundation on Aug. 9.
lead_paragraph: The family will spend time in August at a home in Amagansett, but will kick off their vacation with a benefit for the Bill, Hillary and Chelsea Clinton Foundation on Aug. 9.

headline.main: For the Clintons, Vacation in the Hamptons Begins With a Fund-Raiser
